name: Concealed
description: No, don't tell on him. I believe he said and I quote 'shhh' which (if the rules of human communication are anything to go by) firmly implies that he wishes that you keep the secret between you and him. Why are the pink folk being hunted you may ask. I don't know and from the look of confusion spreading across your face, I guess neither do you.. Being chased just because he's pink in color sounds absurd... or does it?
